thread.title: Ruth Negga Wears ACLU Ribbon With Valentino Gown at 2017 Oscars – Ruth Negga Academy Awards Red Carpet
thread.title_full: Ruth Negga Wears ACLU Ribbon With Valentino Gown at 2017 Oscars – Ruth Negga Academy Awards Red Carpet

author: Lauren Alexis Fisher
title: Ruth Negga Wears ACLU Ribbon With Valentino Gown at 2017 Oscars – Ruth Negga Academy Awards Red Carpet

organizations.name: ruth negga academy awards red carpet

text: Ruth Negga, who's nominated tonight for Best Actress in Loving , arrived to the Oscars red carpet making a powerful statement with her look. Wearing a custom red Valentino gown, the actress made her already stunning look standout more by pinning a light blue ribbon to her dress. The light blue ribbon shows support for the American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU), a non-profit organization committed to protecting rights for all Americans regardless of race, gender, religion or sexual orientation. Most recently, the ACLU has been outspoken in protecting those whose rights have been threatened under the Trump administration.
